content: What is the largest and deepest ocean on Earth?

The largest and deepest ocean on Earth is the Pacific Ocean. It covers approximately 63 million square miles (163 million square kilometers), which is about 46% of the Earth's water surface and more than twice the area of the next largest ocean, the Atlantic Ocean. The Pacific Ocean also holds the deepest known point on Earth, known as the Challenger Deep, located in the Mariana Trench, which reaches a depth of approximately 36,070 feet (10,994 meters).
